title: 7.1【中方嚴重違反《中英聯合聲明》！要求將香港歸還英國！】請願

replies.msg:
今個星期日七月一日去英國駐港總領事館請願，跟住參與七一遊行宣揚歸英理念，攞住英國旗香港旗前往香港特區政府總部。

日期：二零一八年七月一日
時間：下午一點正
地點：英國駐港總領事館

誠邀你加入！

7.1 Protest【The Chinese outrageously breached the Sino-British Joint Declaration! Return Hong Kong to the UK!】

We will protest at the British Consulate-General Hong Kong on 1st July, 2018 this coming Sunday. We will then join the 1-July rally to advocate our HK-UK reunion idea and march towards the HKSAR Government Headquarters.

Date: 1st July, 2018
Time: 1:00 p.m
Venue: British Consulate-General Hong Kong

You are welcomed to join us!

https://www.facebook.com/events/489448348154385/
